name: Rotella Fully Formulated AFC w/SCA 40/60
description: New coolant product for stationary gas engine power generation market

Rotella Fully Formulated AFC w/SCA 40/60 United States EN TDG V1.2 14-Nov-2018

marketing: Shell Rotella^Â®^ Fully Formulated AFC with SCA Pre-Diluted 40/60 Antifreeze/Coolant (AFC) is a conventional heavy-duty AFC pre-diluted to 40% ethylene glycol while maintaining a full treat of corrosion inhibitors to provide the same level of corrosion protection as expected with a traditional 50/50 pre-dilution.  The phosphate free formulation meets requirements for OEMs such as Detroit Diesel where a conventional AFC requiring SCA maintenance is used.
